<row gap="medium">

**Usage** carried

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

_The Mountain Man_ represents creatures with incredible physical power. As long as you have _The Mountain Man_ invested, it grants you a +2 item bonus to [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) checks to [Force Open](/Actions.aspx?ID=34), [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=35), [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38), or [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40). This increases to a +3 item bonus if you are at least 17th level.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> command, Interact;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You bring the might of the mountain into your body. You cast 2nd-level or 4th-level [_enlarge_](/Spells.aspx?ID=102) upon yourself. If you're at least 15th level, the duration increases to 1 hour.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
